sample_docs: Durability. That sums up 3M cardboard mounting frames for transparency film. Your visuals are better protected and look more professional when placed in our durable cardboard mounting frames. Our cardboard mounting frames also come in a convenient and protective box for filing and storage. 3M™ Cardboard Frames RS7120 — 50-sheet box. Whatever your presentation needs, we can help you become more productive in your next meeting with high-quality transparencies. Most importantly, we offer a complete line of transparency film, so you'll find the exact type to use with your specific printer and copier. Try our new Professional Quality Transparency Films designed to make the most of today's high-quality printers. For a polished, professional look, protect your transparencies in a 3M™ Flip-Frame™ Transparency Protector . Make a lasting impression on audiences with 3M Professional Quality Transparency Film CG3490. This NEW deluxe film, made from the highest quality materials, is designed to work with today's faster color inkjet printers. It dries quickly to prevent sticking. It handles easily, stays flat, and stacks reliably during long print jobs, freeing end users for more important tasks. Stacks to free end users for more important tasks Creates clearer, richer color images Produces crisper black-and-white text Works with today's faster color inkjet printers Impress audiences with 3M Professional Quality Transparency Film CG3720. This NEW top-of-the-line film creates bright, vivid color images and sharp black-and-white text for the latest generation of color laser printers. Because the film has an enhanced color laser coating, color overheads always appear vibrant against all types of backgrounds. Works with the latest generation of color laser printers Uses enhanced color laser coating for spectacular colors Creates bright vibrant color images against all backgrounds Makes black-and-white text appear sharp and crisp Performs under all environmental conditions Works with todays high-end inkjet printers plus older models. Clear, 50 sheets per box. For high end color laser printers. Clear transparency film, 50 sheets per box.
